name: Star Shooters (Struckdown)
description:
Graze through space and destroy everything in your path! Harvest energy from your foes attacks, and return fire.

Controls are rebindable. No controller support since I can't test it properly!

Arrow keys to move

Z to shoot

Shift to move slower and see your hitbox

Escape or P to pause

I've disabled HTML for now as there seems to be a stuttering issue in HTML 5 seemingly related to particles
